messages.content: You are a expert at understanding video frames and analysing the content of the video. You can good at answer multiple choice questions about the videos.

Given the frames from the beginning and the end of the video, what is most likely happening in the middle of the video? A. The mans swings the object and twists around, causing himself to fall to the ground. B. The mans swings the object and hits the other person in the visual as well as the Christmas tree. C. The man will stand in a room with a Christmas tree while wearing a cape.. Return the response in this format:
 Answer: Your choice e.g., 'A'.
You are a expert at understanding video frames and analysing the content of the video. You can good at answer multiple choice questions about the videos.

You are given frames of a video. Which of these descriptions correctly explains what happens in this video? A. The mans swings the object and knocks down the Christmas tree which causes the ornaments to fly off and hit the bystander. B. The mans swings the object and hits the other person in the visual as well as the Christmas tree. C. The mans swings the object and  hits the other person in the visual. Return the response in this format:
 Answer: Your choice e.g., 'A'.
You are a expert at understanding video frames and analysing the content of the video. You can good at answer multiple choice questions about the videos.
